articles.title: Liverpool's Ibrahima Konate breaks FIFA World Cup record to give France new problem - The Mirror
articles.description: Liverpool defender Ibrahima Konate broke a World Cup record during France's disappointing 1-0 defeat against Tunisia on Wednesday and is now pushing for a start when they face Poland in the Round of 16
articles.content:
Ibrahima Konate has given France boss Didier Deschamps a major World Cup selection headache after making the most tackles in a single game during the tournament so far.
